00009 SocketConnection::SocketConnection() {
00010     connected = false;
00011     host = "";
00012     port = 80;

00020 bool SocketConnection::connect() {
00021     if (connected) {
00022         return connected;
00023     }
00024 
00025     if (SDLNet_ResolveHost(&address, host.c_str(), port) == -1) {
00026         Error::error("SDLNet_Init: %s\n", SDLNet_GetError());
00027     }
00028 
00029     connection = SDLNet_TCP_Open(&address);
00030     if(connection) {
00031         connected = true;
00032     } else {
00033         Error::error("SDLNet_TCP_Open: %s\n", SDLNet_GetError());
00034         connected = false;
00035     }
00036     return connected;
00037 }
00038 
00044 std::string SocketConnection::lastError() {
00045     if (errors.size()) {
00046         return errors[errors.size() - 1];
00047     }
00048     return "";
00049 }
00050 
00056 void SocketConnection::addError(std::string errorString) {
00057     errors.push_back(errorString);
00058 }
00065 bool SocketConnection::write(std::string toWrite) {
00066     if (!connected) {
00067         if (!connect()) {
00068             return false;
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     int result = SDLNet_TCP_Send(connection, toWrite.c_str(), toWrite.size() + 1);
00073     if(result < (toWrite.size() + 1)) {
00074         printf("SDLNet_TCP_Send: %s\n", SDLNet_GetError());
00075         // It may be good to disconnect sock because it is likely invalid now.
00076     }
00077 
00078     return true;
00079 }
00080 
00087 std::string SocketConnection::read(int length) {
00088     if (!connected) {
00089         if (!connect()) {
00090             return false;
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094     char stringback[1024];
00095     int result = SDLNet_TCP_Recv(connection,stringback,length);
00096     if (result <= 0) {
00097         // An error may have occured, but sometimes you can just ignore it
00098         // It may be good to disconnect sock because it is likely invalid now.
00099     }
00100 
00101     return stringback;
00102 }

00111 bool SocketConnection::disconnect() {
00112     SDLNet_TCP_Close(connection);
00113     return true;
00114 }
